=GMBCG cluster finder user manual=

== Configuration ==

   * gmbcg_loop.pro
     {{{
       input_dir='/somewhere/'    
       cat_dir='/some where else/' 
                                                                     
     }}}

==Tunable parameters:==
 * In gmbcg_loop.pro: set the redshift divides of different color ridgeline
 {{{
       x_gr=where(str.photoz le 0.35)
       x_ri=where(str.photoz gt 0.35 and str.photoz le 0.7)  
       x_iz=where(str.photoz gt 0.7 and str.photoz le 1.0)              
       x_zy=where(str.photoz gt 1.0)      
                                                                
}}}

  * In des_mock_gmbcg.pro
{{{
   srad=1./angdist_lambda(gal[inok].photoz)  ;1.0 is the 1 Mpc searching aperture
}}}
